successes.title: Xia: Legends of a Drift System
successes.description: Customize your starship, explore, trade, mine, fight and become a Legend! A 3-5 player sandbox style tabletop miniatures adventure!

Pledges.description: Every bit helps! Thank you for supporting us!

[BOXED COPY - USA]
One boxed copy of Xia: Legends of a Drift System. Free shipping. Any and all stretch goals.
[BOXED COPY - CANADA] One boxed copy of Xia: Legends of a Drift System. Free shipping. Any and all stretch goals.
[SELLSWORD - USA] One boxed copy of Xia: Legends of a Drift System + Sellsword Miniature & Card. Free shipping. Any and all stretch goals.
